song.eTitle: Give to the Winds Your Fears

verses.verse: To Him commit your griefs Your ways put in His hands- To His sure truth and tender care Who earth and heaven commands
O put your trust in God; In duties path go on. Walk in his strength with faith and hope, So shall your work be done.
Leave to His soveriegn sway To choose and to command So you shall, faithful, seek in His way How wise, how strong his hand!
